articles.title: Turning Red review: Pixar’s emotional action movie is one of its best - Polygon
articles.description: Pixar’s Turning Red, from Bao director Domee Shi, is a great film that embraces quirkiness, Asian-American life, and big action. The movie releases on Disney Plus on March 11. Here’s how to tell if it’s for you and the kids in your life.

articles.title: Covid may turn into endemic disease in Thailand by early July: ministry - The Star Online
articles.description: BANGKOK (The Nation/Asia News Network): The Public Health Ministry reckons the Covid-19 situation will improve enough to be considered an endemic disease by early July, government spokesman Thanakorn Wangboonkongchana (pic) said on Sunday (March 6).
